comment:
* A class with information on a single media item for use in browsing/searching media.
     * MediaItems are application dependent so we cannot guarantee that they contain the
     * right values.

variables.name: FLAG_BROWSABLE
variables.comment: * Flag: Indicates that the item has children of its own.

variables.name: FLAG_PLAYABLE
variables.comment:
* Flag: Indicates that the item is playable. *

* The id of this item may be passed to * {@link MediaController.TransportControls#playFromMediaId(String, Bundle)} * to start playing it. *

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel out, int flags)
public int getFlags()
methods.comment: * Gets the flags of the item.

methods.name: public boolean isBrowsable()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether this item is browsable.
         * @see #FLAG_BROWSABLE

methods.name: public boolean isPlayable()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether this item is playable.
         * @see #FLAG_PLAYABLE

methods.name: public MediaDescription getDescription()
methods.comment: * Returns the description of the media.

methods.name: public String getMediaId()
methods.comment:
* Returns the media id in the {@link MediaDescription} for this item.
         * @see android.media.MediaMetadata#METADATA_KEY_MEDIA_ID

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel out, int flags)
